main event: Two local residents observed a UFO with a greenish and bluish glow in Rapid City, South Dakota on July 8, 1964.
interesting points: The sighting occurred around 2225L and lasted for approximately 10 minutes., The object was described as a bright light that maneuvered in a straight path., The color of the object had both greenish and bluish glows., The report was forwarded to Project Blue Book without further investigation., The analyst concluded the sighting could have been the planet Venus.
sighted object: a bright light with a greenish glow
